title: riocasinoback
author: riocasinoback
created_time: January 20, 2023, 02:08:03 AMLast edit: January 21, 2023, 04:59:34 AM by riocasinoback
content: i was on a physical casino and lost around  10 million pesos colombianos (2134$) on a roullete today. in colombia casino. i was at this point extremely triggered mentally   and  logged in on my stake.com  account  while at the casino and put 3000 usd on a double ball roullete in one bet and won 2.5x (i am glad i recover. btw i am planning to take off some time off of the casino and do only sport betting. here proof of my winshttps://imgur.com/a/GTk7k7chttps://i.imgur.com/xbjEN97.pngnext time when you feel hopeless and depressed take a line of coke  cheer up and retry your bet.

comments.author: Bttzed03
comments.body: Quote from: riocasinoback on January 20, 2023, 02:08:03 AMi was on a physical casino and lost around  10 million pesos colombianos (2134$) on a roullete. i was at this point extremely triggered mentally   that i logged in on my stake.com  account  while at the casino and put 3000 usd on a roullete in one bet and won 2.5x (played my 10  favorite numbers) it was double ball roullete. Do you always do this? Normally, chasing losses isn't recommended but it looks like it works for you.In your screenshots, why is your bet in USD but your winning is in Euro?

comments.author: riocasinoback
comments.created_time: January 20, 2023, 02:30:51 AMLast edit: January 20, 2023, 02:43:57 AM by riocasinoback
comments.body: Quote from: Bttzed03 on January 20, 2023, 02:27:08 AMQuote from: riocasinoback on January 20, 2023, 02:08:03 AMi was on a physical casino and lost around  10 million pesos colombianos (2134$) on a roullete. i was at this point extremely triggered mentally   that i logged in on my stake.com  account  while at the casino and put 3000 usd on a roullete in one bet and won 2.5x (played my 10  favorite numbers) it was double ball roullete. Do you always do this? Normally, chasing losses isn't recommended but it looks like it works for you.In your screenshots, why is your bet in USD but your winning is in Euro?yes i usually chase otherwise i feel beaten up like a loser is the worse feeling. i and you want to break anything around you. feeling pathetic. but then i win and i felt good again. the game show  on euro probably the setting in stake.

comments.author: riocasinoback
comments.body: i should have won 9k if i play normal roullete.  i play double ball roullete by mistake and got 2.5x instead of 3.5x. they throw 2 balls at the same time.  not fan of this game. i mistakenely choose this game. here my chat with stake https://imgur.com/a/UqVAtyi

comments.author: Edwardard
comments.body: Quote from: riocasinoback on January 20, 2023, 02:30:51 AMyes i usually chase otherwise i feel beaten up like a loser is the worse feeling. i and you want to break anything around you.feeling pathetic. but then i win and i felt good again.Typical example of a gambling addiction.I dont know should we congratulate you on your current winnings or warn you of your future ahead with this type of addiction. It doesnt seem bright enough to me. And the amount you are playing with is also quite large (atleast for a major portion of the countries in the world). Be safe mate and atleast make sure you enjoy a bit or help your family with those winnings you made today. Dont bet all in with it again. Thats all I can say!

comments.author: michellee
comments.body: This time you are still lucky but who knows tomorrow, you will lose more money. No one can be lucky every day but you are indeed that lucky person. Congratulations on your big win and being able to recover your losses but remember, it won't last forever.I wonder whether you can withdraw that big money. Are you required to fulfil requirements before they can proceed with the withdrawal process?

comments.author: Dave1
comments.body: Good for you, at least you have recovered what you have lots in a physical casino because that is a huge amount of money to be losing at least in my casino.Nevertheless, I understand your situation, I mean you really desperate and wanted to get back regarding your losses. The thing is you got lucky with roullete, not sure though if you are going to be lucky the next time.

comments.author: pawanjain
comments.body: Quote from: riocasinoback on January 20, 2023, 02:38:57 AM i should have won 9k if i play normal roullete.  i play double ball roullete by mistake and got 2.5x instead of 3.5x. they throw 2 balls at the same time.  not fan of this game. i mistakenely choose this game. here my chat with stake https://imgur.com/a/UqVAtyiFrom your posts, it sounds like you throw your money just like that at any game without any prior thinking.It's a habit of a pure gambler and I know it must be tough to control your emotions when you lose.It's good that you won a good amount of profits but at the same time you must be cautious when you are gambling.You must think twice of what you are doing. One mistake can empty your account just like that in gambling.

comments.author: wxa7115
comments.body: Quote from: riocasinoback on January 20, 2023, 02:08:03 AMi was on a physical casino and lost around  10 million pesos colombianos (2134$) on a roullete today. in colombia casino. i was at this point extremely triggered mentally   and  logged in on my stake.com  account  while at the casino and put 3000 usd on a double ball roullete in one bet and won 2.5x (i am glad i recover. btw i am planning to take off some time off of the casino and do only sport betting. here proof of my winshttps://imgur.com/a/GTk7k7chttps://i.imgur.com/xbjEN97.pngnext time when you feel hopeless and depressed take a line of coke  cheer up and retry your bet.The last sentence is really worrying as it seems it is a pattern for you, most gamblers at some point lose more than what they could afford and chase their losses, but after losing they get back to their senses, they understand that what they did was wrong and they take steps to avoid doing this again.However in your case it seems you are advocating to chase your losses, which is a very dangerous behavior, and this is because even if you won this time and you recovered your money there is no way to make sure this will be the case, and the next time you do this you could just dig a bigger hole for yourself and lose even more money.

comments.author: BenCodie
comments.body: Your stupidity makes a great story/topic however you have to also think how it would have felt if you had lost this best. I think you've made a good choice sticking to sports betting after this move, and I hope that you stick to that as a mild leisure and not a means to another one of these moments.

comments.author: klidex
comments.body: Quote from: Bttzed03 on January 20, 2023, 02:27:08 AMQuote from: riocasinoback on January 20, 2023, 02:08:03 AMi was on a physical casino and lost around  10 million pesos colombianos (2134$) on a roullete. i was at this point extremely triggered mentally   that i logged in on my stake.com  account  while at the casino and put 3000 usd on a roullete in one bet and won 2.5x (played my 10  favorite numbers) it was double ball roullete. Do you always do this? Normally, chasing losses isn't recommended but it looks like it works for you.Such things are indeed often done by some gamblers with the aim of returning the lost capital.I myself also did the same when I was playing and suffered a loss.However, before continuing to play again, you must be completely calm first and pay attention to the course of the game to be able to analyze the correct positioning.In fact, it is true that chasing losses is not recommended because it can add to the feeling of emotion and curiosity which has a negative impact on gamblers experiencing more and more losses and losses. However, every gambler has a different way when they are experiencing defeat, not all of them are like that.

comments.author: piebeyb
comments.body: me when I lose and lose money at gambling, I will stop for a few days to control myself and my emotions in playing, maybe you are lucky on Stake.com but maybe I am not as lucky as you let alone other people, your advice is pretty good but it could be plunge people, but congrats on your victory

comments.author: sujonali1819
comments.body: There are a lot of gamblers here in this forum. Each of them wins or loses every day. That not means everybody will come to share their winning and losing history on this board every day. But you are doing that. First, you come with doubling the ETH story in the dice game, again come with BC game dice game is better than the stake. Now again come with another story.So what I want to say is that I think you should create a specific topic for it where you can create a new post for your every story, no need to create a new topic every day. And I also believe this topic should be on Gambling discussion section. Keep this board only for announcing new projects. Thank you.

comments.author: bettercrypto
comments.body: Quote from: riocasinoback on January 20, 2023, 02:08:03 AMi was on a physical casino and lost around  10 million pesos colombianos (2134$) on a roullete today. in colombia casino. i was at this point extremely triggered mentally   and  logged in on my stake.com  account  while at the casino and put 3000 usd on a double ball roullete in one bet and won 2.5x (i am glad i recover. btw i am planning to take off some time off of the casino and do only sport betting. here proof of my winshttps://imgur.com/a/GTk7k7chttps://i.imgur.com/xbjEN97.pngnext time when you feel hopeless and depressed take a line of coke  cheer up and retry your bet. What I can tell you is that you dare to bet that amount, I rarely see such a style to be honest, you are lucky if that happened to you. I've never experienced such a big bet because I'm not addicted to gambling, but of course, I want to win big money in the casino and I haven't experienced that yet.The biggest I've ever won was around 316$ playing casino slot games. But obviously, there is an addiction to gambling in reality.

comments.author: QueenVera
comments.body: Congrats to you but I guess you did your last bet chasing your loss and that's not good because in most cases it always ends with negative results but I'm glad you're was good and you came out fine and I also guess your advice on getting a chill coke beer was because you won and what if you lost, would you have given such an advise ?Most times we really don't know when the addiction to gambling starts creeping in because it seems from the look of things, you really didn't know when to stop and that's a major sign of addiction and you ought to work on that because everyday might not be a good day.

comments.author: ethereumhunter
comments.body: I congratulate you on your win and enjoy the winning money with your loved ones. But trying to recover what we've already lost isn't a good thing because we have to realize that it can't work every time.After this win, I hope you can take a break to enjoy the win and don't think about starting gambling again because you just got tremendous tension and excitement. You have to suppress the feeling of wanting to gamble and try to get another victory because that could lead you to the destruction you don't want.

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: congrats for you win and thanks for sharing here ! Most of people coming of forum just for complaining, read some nice win it's always a pleasure.I think it's also a wise decision stop to bet/gamble for a while. These kind of games are just lucky based, you can't have a real strategy on long term

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: Quote from: riocasinoback on January 20, 2023, 02:08:03 AMi was on a physical casino and lost around  10 million pesos colombianos (2134$) on a roullete today. in colombia casino. i was at this point extremely triggered mentally   and  logged in on my stake.com  account  while at the casino and put 3000 usd on a double ball roullete in one bet and won 2.5x (i am glad i recover. btw i am planning to take off some time off of the casino and do only sport betting. here proof of my winshttps://imgur.com/a/GTk7k7chttps://i.imgur.com/xbjEN97.pngnext time when you feel hopeless and depressed take a line of coke  cheer up and retry your bet.Well, what can I say here, I think that you are very lucky that you managed to win back the loss and this is just a lucky case. Often in gambling, an attempt to recoup leads to even greater losses and I would not advise someone to repeat this.

comments.author: seoincorporation
comments.body: Quote from: riocasinoback on January 20, 2023, 02:08:03 AMnext time when you feel hopeless and depressed take a line of coke  cheer up and retry your bet.And if it doesn't work? What would happen if you lose that bet?It was a nice move, but it could have a sad end with a $5134 loss, but luck was on your side this time. Let's hope it stays there.By the way, drugs an gambling is not the best combo, if we want to have a clear mind while betting the best way is without drugs. But I respect you way, if that works for you then gg.

comments.author: Johnyz
comments.body: Maybe your luck is on crypto gambling, you're lucky to get back your losses. Actually you bet more in crypto and I can't imagine what will happen to you if you also lose that money. Anyway, its good to have a break in gambling and learn how to control your emotion next time, in gambling you should be more ready to lose money because its normal and its not guaranteed, you can be more happy if you gamble with your free money and not your savings.
